Enamel is the outer coating of a tooth which naturally protects the core against damaging acid attacks. Despite its hardness, this enamel suffers daily erosion caused by food and drink, but now this early erosion process can be reversed with the Advanced Toothpaste and its unique NR-5™ Technology. With regular use, this toothpaste strengthens and protects the teeth against cavities and weakness by restoring the enamel mineral*content and replenishing original whiteness.
The innovative formulation features a dense and rich texture thanks to its high concentration of ingredients, whilst the refreshing mint sensation it delivers will keep your mouth feeling and smelling fresh throughout the day. K.D.
Directions for use:
Advanced Toothpaste should be used daily, at least twice a day in place of your regular toothpaste.

MenScience Microfine face scrub is formulated with glycolic acid which is used by dermatologists and skin care professionals to gently shed upper layers of the skin. Salicylic acid is a powerful professional ingredient for the treatment of acne, ingrown hairs, and dandruff, and combating signs of ageing. It also contains allantoin, a superior anti-irritant and soothing agent of botanical origin, aloe vera extract, a well-recognised moisturising, healing and anti-inflammatory properties; and urea, a moisturiser capable of attracting and retaining water.

name: Sport Scalp Razor
product_description:
HeadBlade Sport brings head shaving to a whole new level. Wheels and triple blade technology come as standard to provide the smoothest head shave possible. Put this thing on your rock and let it roll.
Pimp my razor anyone!? If you shave your head then this revolutionary razor made for shaving the scalp is a must! This groundbreaking design, loved by celebrities, has been modified but still gives your scalp the easiest, smoothest shave imaginable.
Unlike a conventional razor, you guide it with just one finger, freeing up the rest of your hand to touch your scalp, leaving you with much more control and a better understanding or "feel" of what you're doing.
The patented suspension of the HeadBlade gives you even more control; you don't have to worry about the angle of the blade. It may sound strange, but with the HeadBlade you lead with the blade first, so by avoiding the sideways movement of conventional razorblades, HeadBlade helps to eliminate the risk of "paper cuts"!
Like a bike, you don't put any weight on the handlebars. So don't put any pressure on the blade. Just make sure the blade and back pad are in contact with the scalp, then take long smooth strokes. You'll get the best shave ever.

Working to give your hair amazing shaped texture, this Hair Toffee from Hairbond gives your hair a stable hold that will last throughout the day. Designed to provide a strong hold, this Hair Toffee boasts an amazing fragrance of Vanilla Butterscotch Toffee that will have you attracting attention wherever you go.
The ultimate hair styling product, this Hair Toffee can give your hair the perfect finish, enhancing style and creating a salon perfect look. Treat yourself to this luxurious hair styling treat.

name: Cool Mint Purify Conditioner 1000ml (Worth £33.00)
product_description: Give your hair a radiant shine with Fudge Cool Mint Purify Conditioner (1000ml). Working to nourish your hair, the effective formula combines menthol, grapefruit and birch tree extract to create a blend that stimulates the hair folicles and scalp with a tingly, cooling sensation. -SA

name: HeadSlick 237ml
product_description: Formulated to give the smoothest head-shave possible, HeadSlick's special lubricants allow blades to glide effortlessly along the skin. HeadSlick is water soluble, so blades rinse easily. And because HeadSlick is mentholated, your skin will feel cool and refreshed after shaving. HeadSlick comes in an 250ml bottle that lasts and lasts, ensuring that you're getting value for your money.

name: Crew Light Hold Styling Gel (250ml)
product_description:
Get light, natural looking hold with American Crew Light Hold Styling Gel. Formulated with natural extracts your hair will appear thicker with added body and shine while a dual polymer complex gives your style a light hold that keeps your style in place.
Excellent for slicking hair or achieving the wet look, American Crew Light Hold Styling Gel gives your style a light, natural hold. Its alcohol free formula helps your hair look thicker with a healthy shine, while its low pH prevents drying of the hair and scalp.
Directions of use:

name: Natty Dub Hair Preparation 100ml
product_description:
Enjoy the best of both worlds with Mr Natty's Dub Hair Preparation, a hybrid hair formula that combines the dry, matt roughness of a clay, with the sharpness of a pomade wax.
Perfect on short and long hair, both wet and dry, the versatile styling putty adds texture and definition to create slicked back, debonair styles, or instant bed-head mania. Use it on dry hair for added weight; it creates a rough, messy, tacky finish with medium shine. Use on wet hair to add slickness with decent hold and glossy finish.

name: Buddy Healthy Facial Wash Tube (15ml)
product_description:
The Buddy Healthy Facial Wash from men-ü is ideal for using pre and post shave. Its unique, soap-free formula deeply cleanses skin and contains powerful ingredients, including antiseptic tea tree oil to protect from breakouts and shaving rashes. Soothing witch hazel heals skin and controls grease, especially around the T-zone, whilst aloe vera and vitamin B5 moisturise skin to leave it hydrated and healthy-looking. The buddy-sized tube is ideal for the man on-the-move. E.N.
Directions for use: Apply a small pea-sized amount of face wash onto wet palms and massage over a damp face to generate a lather. Rinse thoroughly and pat dry.

name: Eye Rescue Formula (28.3g)
product_description:
Rescue your eyes, before it is too late with MenScience Eye Rescue Formula. This ultra light formula goes on matte and invisible, packing a unique and powerful combination of the most advanced ingredients for serious results.
MenScience Eye Rescue Formula is recommended for fine lines, dark circles, devitalised skin, and anti-ageing. It’s unique formula increases suppleness, firm’s your skin, and diminishes the appearance of fine lines. It will visibly reduce the appearance of puffiness, helping to repair the signs of damaged skin and combating the ageing process by protecting from the damaging effects of free radicals.
Directions of use:

name: Tonic Gentle Body Wash (250ml)
product_description:
Suitable for all skin types, Gentlemen’s Tonic Gentle Body Wash cleans and energises while maintaining the skins natural moisture balance. Containing a high level of vegetable glycerine with honey and wheat extract it helps soften and condition tired skin.
Gentlemen’s Tonic Gentle Body Wash uses menthol to freshen, invigorate, cool and deodorise the skin while ginger extract acts as a strong anti-inflammatory agent and also helps to stimulate and energise the skin's surface.
The Gentlemen's Tonic range consists of naturally based plant-derived materials from sustained and renewable resources that are specifically formulated for men's skin and hair.
Directions of use:

name: Buddy Facial Moisturiser Lift Tube (15ml)
product_description:
men-ü Buddy Facial Moisturiser Lift Tube is a two-in-one aftershave balm and moisturiser to relieve redness. The non-greasy treatment soothes and smoothens skin, leaving it with a cooling mint and menthol fragrance. Suitable for use on the face after a bath or shower, or as a face wash when you need a refreshing boost. The buddy-sized tube is ideal for the man on-the-move. E.N.
Directions for use: Towel dry the face after washing and rinsing. Apply a large pea sized amount into palms and apply to the face and neck area. Avoid contact with eyes.

name: Facial Cleansing Mask (130ml)
product_description:
You can actually feel MenScience Facial Cleansing Mask working as it absorbs impurities and clears pores of residues and excess oil to leave your skin super clean, revitalised and smooth.
Ideal for all skin types, MenScience Facial Cleansing Mask uses a mix of pulverised green tea and refined clay to create a skin treat unlike anything you have put on your face before. It detoxifies, purifies and revitalises your skin, leaving it renewed and infused with active antioxidants while absorbing impurities and pore-clogging oily residue for deep-down cleansing and a clear complexion.
Directions of use:

name: Webb Men's R1 Stand - Black
product_description:
Boasting an innovative and stylish design, the Bolin Webb Men's R1 Stand will hold your R1 razor hygienically and conveniently, preventing it from coming into contact with dirt and bacteria. The pebble shaped stand has a sleek and smooth finish for a truly modern and contemporary feel. - L.M.
Please Note: Razor is not included and is for illustration purposes only.

name: Tonic Savile Row Razor - Ivory
product_description:
Elegant, functional and designed to give a perfected performance, the Savile Row Razor by Gentlemen's Tonic features an effective Mach III blade for a super smooth, irritation free shave. Created with a faux Ivory handle, this unique razor exudes  classic, timeless style.
Hand made, it boasts the perfect weight to ensure the right amount of pressure is applied to the skin when shaving. You'll be left with smooth skin and the closest shave. K.D.

name: ISSA™ - Cool Black
product_description:
Helping you to achieve the cleanest mouth you've ever had, FOREO ISSA™ presents the first beauty routine for your smile. Featuring soft and ultra-gentle silicone bristles to create the perfect friction, the lightweight and travel friendly, ergonomic brush has 3D flexibility and curves to the shape of your mouth to reach every crevice.
Working to ensure your mouth and gums are healthy and to help you achieve brighter and whiter teeth, the ISSA™ is electric and has a pulsating action that stimulates additional blood flow to achieve healthier gums and prevent gum disease.
With an 8-speed interface, the device allows you to chose your frequency of pulsations to suit your requirements. Every 30 seconds, the ISSA™ will pulse rapidly, indicating it is time to clean a different section of your mouth, and after 2 minutes it will pulse again to signify the end of the dental care routine. -SA
Please Note: A USB charger is included, and not a mains adapter. Also, the brush head only needs to be replaced once a year.

name: F. Trumper Wooden Shave Bowl - Coconut 80g
product_description: Supplied in a hand turned wooden bowl, this fine quality hard shaving  soap is specially formulated using essential oils to give a smooth  shave and to leave the skin soft. Coconut oil extract is moisturising  and caring for dry and sensitive skin. Beautifully presented, these  Shave Bowls make an excellent gift.

name: Black Intense Therapy Hand Cream (88ml)
product_description:
An intense formulation designed to repair and hydrate tired, dry hands. With a non-greasy finish, this cream softens even the toughest dry skin whilst nourishing your cuticles. Botanical extracts also provide protection from bacteria.
Directions of Use: Apply to hands daily to keep them nourished and moisturised.

name: MD Acyl Deep Crease Serum 30ml
product_description:
An innovative, super powerful anti-ageing treatment, this Acyl Deep Crease Serum by Perricone MD is perfect for complexions harbouring deeply etched expression lines and wrinkles. Boasting a visible soothing effect of all these creases in the skin, this serum is the ideal non invasive alternative to achieve a youthful appearance.
Creating a youthful illuminating effect on the skin, this serum is paraben free and works to soften facial lines. Formulated with Acyl-Glutathione to relax facial expressions and Vitamin C to give radiance, your skin will be left looking and feeling younger. K.D.

name: Men's Moisturizing Self Tanner (50ml)
product_description: Give skin moisture and a natural glow with the Shiseido Men's Moisturizing Self Tanner (50ml). The hydrating tinted moisturiser provides an even bronzed tan without leaving a greasy residue or unpleasant fragrance. Achieve healthy looking glow all year round. - K.R

name: Cruzer 6 Precision
product_description: Keep your moustache, facial hair and side burns groomed to perfection with the Braun Cruzer 6 Precision trimmer. With 5mm and 8mm trimming combs, it will allow for precise trimming. The extra small head will help you to get to those hard-to-reach areas, whilst gliding close to the skin for less irritation. Great for shaping and contouring, the trimmer heads can also be removed for easy cleaning under running water. - L.M.

name: Relaxing Chamomile Body Wash 887ml
product_description:
JÁSÖN Relaxing Chamomile Satin Body Wash Pump (900ml) is a body cleanser that leaves skin feeling soft and nourished as well as thoroughly clean. Chamomile and avocado extract provide a soothing and relaxing formula with a calming scent.
Vitamin E and Pro-Vitamin B5 have been added to the natural blend for brighter protected skin from head to toe. - K.R

name: Groomsman Pro 3 in 1 Precision Trimmer
product_description:
Perfect for all-round grooming, the Wahl Groomsman Pro 3 In 1 Precision Trimmer features a trimmer, shaver and nose hair trimmer to keep you looking your best all the time. The high carbon steel blades stay sharper for longer, whilst the range of attachments will help you to achieve your ideal look. Ideal for stubble, beards and tidying necklines.
A full charge will also give you 60 minutes of cordless use, meaning you don't have to worry about annoying cables.

name: Black Dry Erase Ultra Calming Face Cream (73ml)
product_description:
This exclusive formula face cream immitates your skin's natural lipids by retaining essential moisture and nutrients, aiding the protective barrier against the environment. It's infused with skin comforters and anti-irritants for a calming cream that reduces redness.
Use as part of your normal regime in the morning after shaving and at night for more intensive hydration. Combine with Jack Black’s RxSeries Protein Booster Skin Serum for even greater anti-aging benefits.
Recommended for dry, sensitive and ageing skin. Also recommended for skin vulnerable to redness, Eczema and Rosacea and for use post-treatment (i.e. after chemical peels, microdermabrasion, or topical steroids).

name: Vogue Mains Clipper Black/Satin
product_description:
The Wahl Vogue Mains Clipper Black/Satin is an easy way to cut, shape and define your hair. The 18 piece set contains everything you need to maintain your style in the comfort of your own home, including eight different grade attachments, ear taper combs and scissors.
Mains operated, the quiet yet powerful high carbon steel-bladed clippers give extra sharpness and are long-lasting, whilst the adjustable taper lever allows you to achieve the perfect angle giving you salon-quality results every time.

Contains:

name: Fibres Light Blonde (30g)
product_description:
Create wonderfully full and thick hair with Nanogen Fibres Light  Blonde       (30g). With a natural look and feel, the 100% pure keratin   fibres     blend   effortlessly with your own hair to create fullness  and   density.
Formulated with patented technology that ensures 400% stronger         binding and dipolar charged fibres for optimal thickening, they're safe         to use on a daily basis.

name: Travel Bag
product_description:
The Personal Travel Bag will store  all of your MenScience essentials, perfect for travel, or taking to the  gym, as the high quality, microweave nylon fabric is water and stain  repellent making it both practical and durable.
The MenScience  Personal Travel Bag is an ideal size to keep all your toiletries in one  place, especially if you travel or go to the gym. It has an easily  accessible central compartment with full top zipper, a side pocket for  smaller items and tough stitching and heavy-duty zippers for durability.  The water resistant lining contains spills and wet items and it  measures 21 cms x 14 cms.

name: Style+ Black Pepper & Bergamot Shower Gel 100ml - Liquifflex
product_description:
Show your skin and hair who's boss with the men-ü Style+ Black Pepper & Bergamot Shower Gel and Liquifflex. The pair work in synergy to leave your skin clean and fresh, and your hair styled to perfection.
Black Pepper & Bergamot Shower Gel (100ml):
An invigorating shower gel enriched with a host of active ingredients and moisturising agents to leave skin clean and refreshed. Transforming into a rich lather, the concentrated formula delivers Pro Vitamin B5 and Vitamin E to keep skin soft and protected. Infused with a spicy, fruity scent to energise the senses.
Liquifflex (100ml):
A cream-to-liquid hair styling formula with medium hold and medium shine. Liquefying in your hands, the formula disperses evenly through hair, delivering flexi-hold that's suitable for all hair types and styles. Its practically weightless feel enhances the appearance of hair thickness and volume for a full-bodied look. Hands are dry to the touch, never sticky.

name: Healthy Hair and Scalp Shampoo (100ml)
product_description: Formulated to moisturise and nourish the scalp while cleansing, the men-ü Healthy Hair and Scalp Shampoo works through the hair to remove sweat, chlorine, styling products and more. Enriched with octopirox, the men’s shampoo is suitable for use with flaky, itchy scalps and, despite a diminutive size that is TSA compliant for carry-on hand luggage, the shampoo delivers up to 120 applications. – L.R.

name: Konjac Sponge Company 100% Pure Big Body Buffer Sponge
product_description: Exfoliate your body with The Big Buffer Sponge in White from The Konjac Sponge Company that has been made from 100% Konjac. Working to gently remove dead skin cells, the sponge helps you to enjoy a luxurious cleanse that will reduce blemishes and ingrown hair to help you restore smooth and supple skin. Designed with six waves, the ergonomically designed sponge is perfect for in the bath or shower. -SA

name: of Old Bond Street Shaving Cream Bowl (150g) - Avocado
product_description:
Working to protect and moisturise your skin to give an overall better shave, the avocado scented Taylor of Old Bond Street Shaving Cream Bowl contains a uniquely smooth cream. Blended with essential oils and natural ingredients, the beautiful avocado fragrance invigorates and calms the senses while the cream itself works into a rich lather. Paraben free. - E.D
- Place cream on either the shaving brush or directly onto the palm of the hand.
- Apply to the face, where the shaving brush is used, and work into a lather.

name: Style+ Black Pepper & Bergamot Shower Gel 100ml - Spray Fix
product_description:
Show your skin and hair who's boss with the men-ü Style+ Black Pepper & Bergamot Shower Gel and Spray Fix. The pair work in synergy to leave your skin clean and fresh, and your hair styled to perfection.
Black Pepper & Bergamot Shower Gel (100ml):
An invigorating shower gel enriched with a host of active ingredients and moisturising agents to leave skin clean and refreshed. Transforming into a rich lather, the concentrated formula delivers Pro Vitamin B5 and Vitamin E to keep skin soft and protected. Infused with a spicy, fruity scent to energise the senses.
Spray Fix (100ml):
A fine hair styling spray with high hold and medium shine. Working to add body and lift to hair, its lightweight formula delivers weightless root lift and hold, lending hair a fuller, more volumised appearance. The ultra-concentrated and flexi-hold precision spray is perfect for all hair types and styles, including fine and thin hair.

name: Natty Famous Beard Elixir 8ml
product_description: Deeply condition your facial fuzz with Mr Natty's Famous Beard Elixir. Enriched with a blend of natural oils, including Vetiver, Patchouli, Bergamot and Grapeseed, the fast-absorbing elixir moisturises skin underneath facial hair, whilst preventing ingrowing hairs and leaving you feeling invigorated all day long. Delivers a masculine woody fragrance and keeps your beard in tip-top condition.

name: Man Cleansing Shave (200ml)
product_description:
Murad Man Cleansing Shave is a two in one innovation that not only cleans your skin, but provides a superior shave with just one product so you’ll get a smooth complexion and a perfect shave.
Using a patented antioxidant-rich cleansing formula which features Murad's exclusive Beard Softening Complex, Murad Man Cleansing Shave uses mushroom enzyme exfoliants to uncover stubborn facial hairs and prepare skin for a superior shave. Then during shaving a unique complex of neem, vitamin E and panthenol infuses skin with moisture-rich antioxidant protection while soothing to help prevent nicks and cuts.
Directions of use:

name: Rock Beard Oil - Jazz
product_description:
Formulated with natural ingredients, including vitamin E, the Men Rock Beard Oil is designed to nourish and moisturise the beard and skin beneath it. A lively scent that is difficult to pin down, the Jazz edition of this beard oil acts like a light cologne as well as a beard softener. Suitable for all skin types. - E.D
- Shake well before use.
- Drip a few drops into your hand and massage gently into beard.
- Avoid contact with eyes and don't ingest.

name: Doctors T-Zone Control No More Oil (30ml)
product_description:
Create flawless skin with Skin Doctors T-Zone Control No More Oil  (30ml). The paraben free facial cream works to control oil production  and absorb excess oil in the T-Zone area.
Combining four unique ingredients, including Resistem, Evermat, Acnacidol and Ronacare, the formula controls sebum production and  absorbs excess sebum on the surface of the skin, whilst  maintaining optimum skin hydration.
Working as a 'bodyguard' to the skin, the cream helps decrease  toxin-induced micro inflammations to soothe skin redness, improve  complexion and restore natural glow. - SA

name: Bed Head Colour Goddess Shampoo (400ml)
product_description:
Perfect for keeping your colour-treated hair vibrant, the TIGI Bed Head Colour Goddess Shampoo (400ml) is blended with sweet almond oil, nourishing coconut oil and keratin to keep hair looking and feeling healthy. Also boasting essential vitamin E intended to strengthen and repair your hair, this shampoo refreshes and cleanses as well as removing product build up. - E.D
- Wet hair thoroughly, lather and rinse.

name: F. Trumper Eucris Hard Shaving Soap Refill 80g
product_description:
This Eucris Hard Shaving Soap by Geo. F. Trumper is a rich and luxurious product designed to give you a close and comfortable shave. Help to wake up your senses with every shave, with the heavy and heady masculine fragrance of Eucris scenting your skin.
This Trumpers Eucris Hard Shaving Soap is glycerine based in order to help nourish and protect your skin from irritation and razor burn whilst shaving. This Shaving Soap is a wonderfully fragranced and moisturising product that would make the perfect addition to your shaving routine.

name: Body Buff Gloves
product_description:
These effective Body Buff Gloves are the perfect complement to MenScience Daily Body Wash and will leave your skin extra clean, soft, and healthy looking.
MenScience Body Buff Gloves help get rid of dull build-up and dead skin cells, which immediately improves your whole skin's appearance. By sloughing off dull build-up and dead skin cells, you will immediately notice the smoothing and renewing benefits of using these buffing gloves.
The deep cleansing effect removes impurities and clears pores, allowing your whole body to feel extra clean and invigorated, immediately resulting in a healthy-looking and balanced skin tone.
Directions of use:

name: Vitamin Edition Body Bar 6.3oz
product_description:
Cleanse and condition your skin with the Zirh Vitamin Edition Body Bar. Suitable for all skin types, the bar utilises an expert blend of vitamins and antioxidants to leave your skin smooth, youthful and protected.
Fortified with soothing Oat Straw and extracts of Orange, Chamomile and Cucumber, the refreshing soap effortlessly eliminates impurities, whilst delivering intense moisture and hydration. Skin is cleansed, energised and awakened.

name: Daily Refresh Shampoo (100ml)
product_description:
Experience super-cleansed hair with men-ü Daily Refresh Shampoo, a gentle yet effective formula that works to intensely hydrate and refresh your barnet.
Moisture is important for hair, just like it is for skin; it leaves it feeling soft and super-resilient. The first step to well-conditioned hair, this shampoo boasts an anionic formula, which means it leaves your hair negatively charged. When paired with a positively-charged conditioner, your hair will reap the benefits and absorb (and retain!) the optimum amount of moisture required. Expect recharged hair with a revitalised appearance. - K.N.

name: Series 5 5040S Wet and Dry Shaver
product_description:
Combining power with precision, the Braun Series 5 5040S Wet and Dry Shaver will allow you to achieve a close and comfortable wet or dry shave. Boasting Super Lift and Cut technology where the first blade lifts and the second blade cuts, it also features FlexMotionTec technology to maximise skin contact, even on difficult areas.
With a foil system, it also has a pop up trimmer that's ideal for moustaches and sideburns. Designed for both corded and cordless use, a one hour charge will provide 45 minutes of cordless use, whilst the 5 minute quick charge will provide enough power for one shave. - L.M.

name: Rock Beard Oil - Soul
product_description:
Formulated with natural ingredients, including vitamin E, the Men Rock Beard Oil is designed to nourish and moisturise the beard and skin beneath it. A fun, good time scent, the Soul edition of this beard oil acts like a light cologne as well as a beard softener. Suitable for all skin types. - E.D
- Shake well before use.
- Drip a few drops into your hand and massage gently into beard.
- Avoid contact with eyes and don't ingest.

name: Hair Thickening Fibres Auburn (15g)
product_description:
Create wonderfully full and thick hair with Nanogen Fibres Auburn (15g). With a natural look and feel, the 100% pure keratin fibres blend effortlessly with your own hair to create fullness and density.
Formulated with patented technology that ensures 400% stronger binding and dipolar charged fibres for optimal thickening, they're safe to use on a daily basis.

name: Black Deep Dive Glycolic Facial Cleanser
product_description: Wash away dead skin cells, pore-clogging oil and build up with Jack  Black Deep Dive Glycolic Facial Cleanser. Recommended for normal,  combination and oil skin, the cleanser helps skin to emerge fresher,  smoother and firmer.  The 2-in-1 cleanser can also be used as a  purifying mask when let to dry on the skin for deep down cleaning - SA

name: Hydraboost Gel 50ml
product_description:
Re-energise your skin with Polaar Hydraboost Gel, a lightweight moisturiser that rehydrates skin whilst boosting its natural defences.
Combining Siberian Ginseng with Siberian Olive extract, the non-greasy gel melts effortlessly into the complexion, revitalising, protecting against free radicals and enhancing resilience for healthier-looking, more energised skin. Infused with a delicate fragrance, skin will be left glowing and comfortable.

name: Ultra Performance-Infused Shave Gel 250ml
product_description:
Experience a close shave every time with Zirh's Ultra Performance Infused Shave Gel; a lightweight, deeply hydrating formula that works to soften and lift facial hair whilst conditioning the skin beneath.
Fortified with soothing Aloe Vera, Jojoba Oil and Glycerin, the shaving gel creates a protective layer over the skin to lock in moisture and allow sleek razor glide with minimised resistance. Antioxidant Vitamin E provides anti-ageing benefits, whilst defending against dryness and environmental aggressors for long-lasting comfort.

name: System 5 Scalp Revitaliser for Medium to Coarse, Normal to Thin Hair 1000ml (Worth £68.30)
product_description:
NIOXIN System 5 Scalp Revitaliser (1000ml) is supercharged with 3 of the brand's unique technologies to condition and treat Medium to Coarse, Normal to Thin Looking, Natural, and Chemically Treated Hair. Smoothplex® technology helps to keep flyaways at bay whilst conditioning and protecting the hair shaft to prevent damage and breakage which can also cause hair loss and thinning.
Glyo-Shield® technology contains a blend of white tea extract and peppermint oil for a refreshed scalp, and conditioning agents to balance moisture and provide protection, particularly for colour-treated hair that needs hydrating.
Transactive Delivery System® combines purifying agents with vitamins and antioxidants to unclog follicles from sebum and environmental residue without stripping hair of essential oils needed to maintain healthy hair.
The System 5 Scalp Revitaliser is the second step in the 3-step NIOXIN regime to help those with hair loss and/or thinning of the hair, whilst also catering to the targeted hair type to maintain a healthy scalp and head of hair.
NIOXIN products have been specially designed to help thicken and revive thinning hair or those suffering with hair loss. With 6 different ranges to choose from, whatever hair type you have NIOXIN can help you.
The brand has so far helped around 50% of people with hair loss or thinning worldwide, and 70% of product users have noticed an improvement within the first few uses.

name: MALE SHAVER SERIES 7-790CC-3
product_description:
Braun Male Saver Series 7 features revolutionary sonic technology that automatically adjusts its power to the density of your beard and delivers an exceptional 10,000 micro vibrations with every stroke - for the ultimate thorough and comfortable shave.
The world's only shaver that automatically reads your face and adjusts its power, the Braun Male Saver Series 7 is the only Braun shaver with 3 different shaving modes: extra sensitive, normal and intensive modes for the different facial zones – for an adjustable shave that best fits your beard and skin. The Braun Male Shaver Series 7 also features the world's only alcohol based 5-step cleaning centre to cleans, de-germ, charge, lubricate and dry your shaver at the touch of a button.
Braun Male Shaver Series 7 features:

name: for Men - Under Eye Patches 4 pieces
product_description:
Recipe for Men - Under Eye Patches 4 pieces 
The Recipe for men Under Eye Patches with aqua collagen are focused treatments for the under eye area, resulting in a refreshed and renewed appearance. Intense deep hydration and reduced puffiness are results of the Transdermal Cosmetic Delivery technology that allows the active ingredients, such as high grade marine collagen and algae extracts, to penetrate and hydrate the skin. The ergonomic design allows the patches to adhere to the contours of the under eye and upper cheek bone area, while providing users with the freedom to apply other facial treatments simultaneously. Contains four treatments.

name: Mint And White Tea Lip Balm SPF 25
product_description:
Keep your lips smooth and soft with the Anthony skincare for men Mint And White Tea Lip Balm. Formulated with SPF 25 to protect the delicate skin on your lips from the sun's harmful UV rays, the lip balm is formulated with resveratrol to nourish lips, whilst stevia will freshen your breath. The unique formula will also leave your lips with a natural-looking, matte finish. - L.M.
Directions for Use: Apply to the lips as often as needed.

name: Glowing Apricot Hand & Body Lotion 227g
product_description:
Relieve very dry, dull skin with JÁSÖN Organic Apricot Hand and Body Lotion, a botanically rich, non-greasy daily lotion that works to deliver long-lasting hydration.
Formulated with apricot and almond oil, the lotion hydrates and nourishes even the driest of skin, to leave your skin gorgeously soft and glowing with radiance. -SA

name: Mens Energizing Formula (75ml)
product_description: Instantly refreshing and moisturising, the Shiseido Men's Energizing Formula (75ml) relieves skin of signs of fatigue. The soothing gel leaves skin feeling soft, fresh and wide awake. - K.R

name: Shave Soap with Nickel Bowl Linden
product_description: Triple Milled with extra Rich Vegetal base, it's tradition with a modern twist.

name: CREW The Abnormal Grooming Set (Worth £69.00)
product_description:
Ideal for the well-groomed gentleman AB CREW present 'The Abnormal Grooming Set'; a kit that promises to make shaving less of a chore. Housed in a bucket tin, the trio lifts facial hair to prepare for shaving, minimises the risk of razor nicks and refreshes just-shaven skin for long-lasting comfort. E.N.
AB CREW Pre-Shave Oil
A protective treatment that prepares facial hair for a close and comfortable shave. Infused with a blend of Amazonian açaí and plant squalene, the pre-shave formula protects the skin whilst lifting hairs for an incredibly close, non-irritating shave. Say goodbye to red and bumpy post-shave skin.
AB CREW Shave Cream
Achieve a closer, comfortable shave with the moisturising shaving cream. Fortified with lubricating mushroom derivatives and renewing black rock minerals, the cream forms a protective cushion to allow effortless gliding of the razor, preventing nicks and burns without clogging the blade. Imparts a masculine scent of high mountain woods. 
AB CREW After-Shave
A fast-absorbing cream-gel formula that works to soothe and moisturise your skin after shaving. Combining reparative Antarctic algae with protective liquid blue rock and vitamins, the hydrating post-shave treatment will leave your skin feeling soft and revitalised with an exclusive desert sand and black rock fragrance.
Please Note: Formulated with Squalane that is plant derived.

product_description:
Designed to remove oil and debris such as sebum, fatty acids and environmental residue which can block hair follicles, the System 1 Cleanser Shampoo by NIOXIN is suitable for normal to fine, thin looking natural hair. product_description:

One type is the Ceramide group of ingredients. The other is an ingredient derived from the "Sweet White Lupin" plant.
Like all Tend Skin products, Waterproof Body Lotion contains no animal derived ingredients and was not tested on animals. You will find that the moisturising effect lasts and lasts. Unconditionally Guaranteed!

name: Shave Cream
product_description: Boasting a rich, dense formula which spreads easily over your skin, the Anthony skincare for men Shave Cream will allow you to enjoy a close and comfortable shave. Formulated with squalene to lubricate your skin, the shaving cream also contains eucalyptus and rosemary extracts which work as natural antiseptics, whilst an infusion of hops helps to relax the skin. Free from benzocaine, it will soften your beard hair and cool your skin on contact, without clogging up your pores. - L.M.

name: Hair Thickening Fibres Auburn (30g)
product_description:
Create wonderfully full and thick hair with Nanogen Fibres Auburn     (30g). With a natural look and feel, the 100% pure keratin  fibres   blend   effortlessly with your own hair to create fullness and  density.
Formulated with patented technology that ensures 400% stronger      binding and dipolar charged fibres for optimal thickening, they're safe      to use on a daily basis.

product_description: The Geo F Trumper Wooden Shave Bowl - Extract of Limes (Normal) features a hand-turned wooden bowl and a finest quality shaving soap. product_description: Fudge Smooth Shot Conditioner will smooth and detangle your hair, whilst enhancing smoothness, softness and shine to create a sleek finish. Made using an expert blend of ginger extract and abyssinian oil which fights frizz and provides deep hydration, the multi-tasking Fudge conditioner also protects your hair against thermal damage, UV rays and environmental aggressors. Your tresses will be left looking smooth and feeling strong. - L.M.

name: Black Beard Lube Conditioning Shave (177ml)
product_description:
Jack Black Beard Lube Conditioning Shave gives you an entirely new way to shave. Unlike traditional shaving foams and gels which can dry out skin, this award winning Beard Lube is 3 products in 1.
Jack Black Beard Lube Conditioning Shave is a pre-shave oil, shave cream and facial skin treatment in one easy-to-use product specially formulated for men's shaving needs. The unique formula of this beard grooming product contains phospholipids - a rich source of essential fatty acids that are essential to the function of your skin to bind moisture and support the natural skin barrier.
Beard Lube is a lightweight, penetrating formula that not only helps prepare your beard by penetrating and softening whisker growth, but it also holds in moisture so your razor blade glides easily. The transparent texture lets you see where you're shaving, helping to prevent nicks and cuts. It’s especially great for shaving side burns, moustache and head and won't clog your blade, because it's super light and rinses easily.
Macadamia nut oil, jojoba oil and glycerin provide a lubricating, protective cushion; peppermint, eucalyptus and menthol refresh and revitalise while heather helps calm and soothe skin.
Directions of use:

name: F. Trumper Eucris Shaving Cream Tube 75g
product_description:
This Eucris Shaving Cream by Geo. F. Trumper is a rich and luxurious product designed to give you a close and comfortable shave, and is travel sized for your convenience. Help to wake up your senses with every shave, with the heavy and heady masculine fragrance of Eucris scenting your skin.
This Trumpers Eucris Shaving Cream is glycerine based in order to help nourish and protect your skin from irritation and razor burn whilst shaving. This Shaving Cream is a wonderfully fragranced and moisturising product that would make the perfect addition to your shaving routine.

product_description:

Enriched with panthenol which delivers vitamin B5 to boost volume, so you can experience healthy-looking, hydrated hair with a thicker appearance. E.N.

product_description:
The MenScience Pigmentation Repair Formula has an invisible matte finish and its dermatological-grade formula reduces the appearance of dark areas and age spots, which can result from sun damage or ageing.
This unique blend, developed specifically for men's skin, helps control abnormal pigment production and eliminates superficial darkened cells. The MenScience Pigmentation Repair Formula helps dissolve damaged, darkened skin patches, exposing new unblemished cells.
This formula that contains 1% retinol visibly fades dark spots whilst restoring a healthy-looking and natural skin tone. It also softens, soothes and aids the repair process.

product_description:
Toning and tightening skin while reducing shine and soothing shaving irritations, men-u Matt Skin Refresh Gel really is a do-it-all product. With up to 100 applications per bottle, this ultra concentrated product is a life saver for oily/combination skin.
Continuing their ethos to introduce more men to quality grooming by delivering visible results, men-u have formulated a unique product that leaves your skin looking better for longer. Removing and controlling excess oil that contributes to breakouts, the men-u Matt Skin Refresh Gel also acts in the fight against shaving irritation by minimising ingrown hairs.
Rich in naturally complex salicylic acid, witch hazel, natural alcohol and Japanese konjac, men-u Matt Skin Refresh Gel controls the flow of natural skin lipids to reduce an oily appearance throughout the day, keeping your skin naturally smooth and clear for longer.

name: Hair System Kit 2 for Noticeably Thinning Natural Hair (3 Products)
product_description:
Containing a trio of products for a three step regime, the NIOXIN Hair System Kit 2 for Noticeably Thinning Natural Hair works to cleanse, optimise and treat the hair for a fuller look and feel. Also designed to refresh the scalp and deliver SPF15 protection, the System Kit 2 is perfect for fine and thinning hair. It contains a mixture of unique and effective technologies that give you noticeable results in up to 30 days. K.D.
NIOXIN System 2 Cleanser Shampoo for Normal to Fine Natural Hair (150ml)
Part of a three step system designed specifically for fine, noticeably thinning natural hair, the System 2 Cleanser Shampoo will deeply cleanse the hair whilst protecting the scalp for a lasting shine. Containing a Scalp Access® delivery system which uses vitamins, botanicals and SPF15 sunscreen, the unique cleanser clears hair follicle sites without stripping hair of essential oils.
NIOXIN System 2 Scalp Revitaliser Conditioner for Normal to Fine Natural Hair (150ml)
Containing innovative BioAMP® technology which increases the fullness of each hair strand whilst reducing hair loss, the scalp revitaliser is also designed to refresh the scalp with added peppermint oil and white tea extract as part of the Activ-Renewal® technology. With added SPF15 protection against damaging sun rays, this conditioner will give your locks with a stunning shine and thicker feel.
NIOXIN System 2 Scalp Treatment for Noticeably Thinning Natural Hair (40ml)
Thicken the hair whilst refreshing the scalp with the System 2 Scalp Treatment for Noticeably Thinning Natural Hair by NIOXIN. A unique leave-in spray treatment, it boasts a blend of innovative technologies which work to thicken fine natural hair types whilst ensuring a refreshed scalp environment. Also formulated with added SPF15 protection to shield the scalp from damaging UV rays.

product_description:
The Up Front Rockin' Gel Pomade by TIGI Bed Head is created to give you salon perfect style whenever you want it. Designed to form 'dos in need of a secure hold, the pomade gives a sleek and shiny finish without leaving a sticky residue.
Boasting an aqueous formula which is kind to hair, it has a medium pliable hold and gives tresses unbeatable texture for a thicker and fuller look. The ultimate hair styling product, the TIGI Bed Head is perfect for creating quiffs and sculpted styles. K.D.

name: System 5 Cleanser Shampoo for Medium to Coarse, Normal to Thin Hair 1000ml (Worth £58.30)
product_description:
NIOXIN System 5 Cleanser Shampoo (1000ml) is supercharged with 3 of the brand's unique technologies to cleanse and treat Medium to Coarse, Normal to Thin Looking, Natural and Chemically Treated Hair. Transactive Delivery System® combines purifying agents with vitamins and antioxidants to unclog follicles from sebum and environmental residue without stripping hair of essential oils needed to maintain healthy hair.
Glyo-Shield® technology contains a blend of white tea extract and peppermint oil for a refreshed scalp, and conditioning agents to balance moisture and provide protection, particularly for colour-treated hair that needs hydrating.
Smoothplex® is the final technology helps to keep flyaways at bay whilst conditioning and protecting the hair shaft to prevent damage and breakage which can also cause hair loss and thinning.
The System 5 Cleanser Shampoo is one of 3 products in the NIOXIN regime to help those with hair loss and/or thinning of the hair, whilst also catering to the targeted hair type to maintain a healthy scalp and head of hair. - K.R
NIOXIN products have been specially designed to help thicken and revive thinning hair or those suffering with hair loss. With 6 different ranges to choose from, whatever hair type you have NIOXIN can help you.
The brand has so far helped around 50% of people with hair loss or thinning worldwide, and 70% of product users have noticed an improvement within the first few uses.

product_description:

Directions for use:
Apply generously all over the body, especially to area that are excessively rough or dry like elbows, knees and feet. Use after showering or whenever skin feels dry. For maximum moisturization, apply to slightly moist skin.

Also boasting unique BioAMP® technology to provide thicker looking locks by increasing the fullness of each hair strand and reducing hair loss, this smoothing conditioner will amplify your hair's texture whilst giving a naturally radiant shine. Its vitamins, proteins and amino acids nourish your scalp to create an optimum environment for stronger, fuller, healthier-looking locks. K.D.

product_description:

An advanced blend of peptides and provitamins seek to activate hair bulb keratinocytes, resulting in thicker lash regrowth and reduced hair loss for a gradual false lash effect. Suitable for daily use, eyes appear well-rested and replenished, with skin feeling smooth, firm and supple.

product_description:
Helping you to achieve the cleanest mouth you've ever had, FOREO ISSA™ presents the first beauty routine for your smile. Featuring soft and ultra-gentle silicone bristles to create the perfect friction, the lightweight and travel friendly, ergonomic brush has 3D flexibility and curves to the shape of your mouth to reach every crevice.
Working to ensure your mouth and gums are healthy and to help you achieve brighter and whiter teeth, the ISSA™ is electric and has a pulsating action that stimulates additional blood flow to achieve healthier gums and prevent gum disease.
With an 8-speed interface, the device allows you to chose your frequency of pulsations to suit your requirements. Every 30 seconds, the ISSA™ will pulse rapidly, indicating it is time to clean a different section of your mouth, and after 2 minutes it will pulse again to signify the end of the dental care routine. -SA
Please Note: A USB charger is included, and not a mains adapter. Also, the brush head only needs to be replaced once a year.

E.N.

Containing sebum absorbers to fight greasy areas on the face, including the infamous T-zone, the formula simultaneously fights excess oil whilst deeply hydrating, leaving your skin with a healthy, matt finish. product_description:
The Wet Brush for Men will painlessly remove knots and tangles from wet hair. Featuring thin, strong and flexible Intelliflex™ bristles which will glide through any type of hair, the detangling brush also has SofTips™ at the tips of the bristles to massage the scalp and stimulate circulation at the follicle.
Firm enough to banish knots yet flexible enough to be kind to your hair and scalp, the Intelliflex™ bristles are designed to bounce back to their original form after every stroke, which helps to reduce hair breakage and damage. The versatile hairbrush can also be used on dry hair, wigs and extensions. - L.M.

name: Hair Thickening Fibres Cinnamon (30g)
product_description:
Create wonderfully full and thick hair with Nanogen Fibres Cinnamon      (30g). With a natural look and feel, the 100% pure keratin  fibres    blend   effortlessly with your own hair to create fullness and  density.
Formulated with patented technology that ensures 400% stronger       binding and dipolar charged fibres for optimal thickening, they're safe       to use on a daily basis.

name: Natty Emergency Flair Shave Kit
product_description:
Mr Natty's Emergency Flair Shave Kit combines everything you need to achieve a sleek, beardless look. Featuring a razor, shave oil and a 100% natural moisturiser; hirsute guys, prepare to be softened, smoothed and conditioned. Housed in flare-inspired, cylindrical packaging.
Razor:
A sleek razor with beechwood handle and removable blades. Simply replace the blades and use over and over again.
Shave Oil (30ml):
A lightweight formula that allows your razor to glide effortlessly over skin with minimised friction, for a clean, comfortable shave. Infused with a blend of Peppermint, Olive and Bergamot, the scented oil soothes, protects and hydrates skin, whilst softening facial hair to prepare for a smooth shave. Prevents nicks and burns and leaves you feeling revitalised all day long.
Save Ya Own Skin Moisturiser (30g):
Utilising 100% natural ingredients (so it's safe for sensitive skin), the hydrating moisturiser combines shea butter with olive oil and beeswax (a natural anti-allergenic) to nourish, soothe and relieve itchy, dry skin. Its anti-inflammatory properties help calm nicks after shaving and leave skin feeling soft, moisturised and conditioned. Infused with patchouli and bergamot oil to create a zesty, woody scent.

name: Black All Over Wash 975ml - Super Size
product_description: A multi-purpose mild wash that works to get rid of dirt and sweat without over stripping the skin and hair of essential natural oils. This all-in-one body wash, facial cleanser and conditioning hair shampoo creates a thick, rich lather while Botanicals give a fresh scent without being too fragranced or heavy.

name: Shine Control Face Cleanser 100ml
product_description:
Experience a revitalising cleanse with Polaar Shine Control Face Cleanser, a soap-free face wash that performs a gentle yet effective cleanse.
Lifting away dirt and impurities, the non-foaming facial cleanser eliminates grime from skin without over-drying, and expertly controls oil and sebum production to promote a shine-free, mattified complexion. Skin is left feel refreshed, revived and toned.

name: Shave Gel
product_description: Specially formulated for sensitive skin, the Anthony skincare for men Shave Gel has a non-detergent formula that won't foam or irritate your skin. Formulated with carrageenan which heals and soothes, aloe which protects and eucalyptus and rosemary extracts which work as natural antiseptics, the shaving gel will hydrate your skin whilst allowing for smooth and easy razor glide. You'll be able to enjoy a comfortable shaving experience. - L.M.

name: Ghost Razor
product_description: An innovation is scalp shaving, the Ghost Razor by HeadBlade is created with a unique ergonomic design which fits comfortably in the hand and glides effortlessly over the head. Without the need for pressure, simply guide it along your scalp with one finger and enjoy a salon perfect finish. K.D.

name: Nickel Plated T Stand
product_description: A classic silhouette with a twist. Eshave T Shaving Stand two arms stand at different heights to hold both an eShave razor and shaving brush while displaying their beauty.

name: Rock Cut Throat Shavette Starter Pack
product_description:
Enjoy a traditional barber shop experience in the comfort of your own home with the Men Rock Cut Throat Shavette Starter Pack. This handy kit contains everything you need to achieve a wonderful wet shave. It's the perfect addition to your personal grooming routine.
Directions of Use:  Apply the shaving cream to wet skin using the brush, then use the blade  to gently shave away unwanted hairs. Rinse your face and blade after you  have finished your shave.

name: Man (60 Tablets)
product_description:
Discover a safe and drug-free approach to hair preservation with Nourkrin Man; a daily supplement designed for men facing the prospect of hair loss and thinning.
The tablets seek to support, normalise and maintain the natural hair growth cycle by providing the correct nutrients to the follicles. The supplements contain Nourkrin’s exclusive ingredient Marilex®, Acerole Cherry Extract and Fenugreek, which work in synergy to provide the scalp with an array of Vitamins, including Vitamin C, A, B1, B2 and B3. The addition of Cod Liver Oil Extract offers a dose of Vitamin A and D.
Finished with D-Biotin, Nourkrin Man is able to contribute to the maintenance of normal hair. With continued use over a six month period, the supplements strive to restore the hair growth cycle to normal, which promotes strong and healthy hair growth, whilst discouraging thinning and loss.

name: Man Value Pack - Contains 180 Tablets Plus Shampoo and Conditioner (2x150ml)
product_description:
Combat hair loss and thinning with the Nourkrin Man Value Pack; a three month supplement supply arriving in a convenient value pack. The collection contains daily supplements to support the hair growth cycle, alongside a bonus shampoo and conditioner, which further discourage loss and thinning. Healthy hair growth is supported and promoted.
Nourkrin Man (180 Tablets)
Discover a safe and drug-free approach to hair preservation with Nourkrin Man; a daily supplement designed for men facing the prospect of hair loss and thinning. The tablets seek to support, normalise and maintain the natural hair growth cycle by providing the correct nutrients to the follicles. The supplements contain Nourkrin’s exclusive ingredient Marilex®, Acerole Cherry Extract and Fenugreek, which work in synergy to provide the scalp with Vitamin C, A, B1, B2 and B3. The addition of Cod Liver Oil Extract offers a dose of Vitamin A and D. Finished with D-Biotin, Nourkrin Man is able to contribute to the maintenance of normal hair. With continued use over a six month period, the supplements strive to restore the hair growth cycle to normal, which promotes strong and healthy hair growth, whilst discouraging thinning and loss.
Shampoo and Scalp Cleanser (150ml)
The Shampoo and Scalp Cleanser is a gentle yet effective formula that helps create an optimum scalp environment to support healthy hair growth. Scientifically formulated, the solution gently cleanses away dirt and impurities whilst protecting components of the hair follicle. Its protective and stimulating properties help to improve the scalp environment and increase the appearance of hair volume.
Conditioner (150ml)
The Conditioner is clinically created to provide support for thinning hair and to help combat hair loss. Gentle enough to use every day, it’s a hair loss solution that will boost follicle strength, and your confidence. The lightweight formula provides gentle nourishment whilst making your hair soft and easy to comb. Specially formulated for damaged hair to contribute to re-growth of problem scalp areas. For best results it is suggested that a combination of Nourkin Extra Strength or Nourkrin Man Tablets are used in conjunction.

name: Mens Eye Soother (15ml)
product_description: Wake up tired eyes in one simple step. The Shiseido Men's Eye Soother (15ml) provides a cooling sensation around the eye area with menthol, whilst working to correct the signs of fatigue and ageing. Targeting dark circles, puffiness and fine lines, the cream helps to maintain a healthy look with its anti-ageing and anti-wrinkle properties. - K.R

name: F. Trumper Rose Hard Shaving Soap Refill 80g
product_description: An 80g refill of the renowned  glycerine based Rose Shaving Soap, designed to fit the wooden shaving  bowls. This fine quality, hard shaving soap contains Rose oil extract  which is moisturising and caring for normal and sensitive skin.

name: Mens Deep Wrinkle Corrector (30ml)
product_description: Reduce and prevent the appearance of wrinkles with the Shiseido Men's Deep Wrinkle Corrector (30ml). The rich, high-performance cream sinks deep into the complexion, smoothing out wrinkles and firming skin. Enriched with Damage Defence Complex, skin's naural protective barrier is increased, helping to reveal a youthful and radiant look. - K.R

name: Rock The Shave Cream (100ml)
product_description:
Forming a rich, lubricating lather, the Men Rock The Shave Cream (100ml) is an essential part of a traditional wet shave experience. When applied with a brush, it forms a protective barrier between your skin and your razor, helping your blade to glide smoothly over your skin, allowing for a close, smooth and irritation-free shaving experience.
The softening and moisturising formula will hydrate your skin, helping to target even the toughest of stubble. Infused with a sandalwood aroma, it will also leave your skin wonderfully scented with a natural, woodland-inspired fragrance. - L.M. Directions of Use:

name: for Men - Concealer 0.3 Dark 2.5ml
product_description:
A creamy and caring liquid concealer with vitamin E. Covers dark circles, bags and puffiness in the under eye area, as well as minor skin complexions such as small rashes and pimples.
Comes in three colors: light, medium and dark.
